com.birbit.android.jobqueue.scheduling

Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.birbit.android.jobqueue.scheduling.Scheduler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BatchingScheduler

    public abstract class Scheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles communication and tracking with a scheduler that can wake up the app / job manager based on external events.

    JobManager will call attached scheduler every time it thinks that the app should be waken up for the given job. Each request comes with a SchedulerConstraint which should be reported back to the JobManager when the system service wakes it up.

      static interface  Scheduler.Callback
      Internal class that handles the communication between the JobManager and the scheduler

      • start

        public final boolean start(SchedulerConstraint constraint)
        Triggers the JobManager to handle the given constraint. JobManager always call onFinished(SchedulerConstraint, boolean) with an async callback.
        Parameters:
        constraint - The constraint
        Returns:
        true if there is work to do be done, false otherwise

        public final boolean stop(SchedulerConstraint constraint)

        public abstract void onFinished(SchedulerConstraint constraint,

        Called by the JobManager when a scheduled constraint is handled.
        Parameters:
        constraint - The original constraint
        reschedule - True if the job should be rescheduled
